Articles.Content:
Explanation: The first poster will ask for a certain item or service, and the replying poster will offer an obviously better alternative. Then that same poster will ask for something themselves.

Da Rulez

1] No profanity allowed.

2] No replying to posts not directly above your own.

3] No asking for something already asked before (within a reasonable time of posting, say, a couple weeks.)

4] Keep the thread alive as much as possible!

EXAMPLE

Poster 1

I want to have a cup of orange juice right now.

Poster 2

No no no, use a flagon. It's much better than a cup.

I would like an Xbox One.

Poster 3:

Absolutely not! Use a Wii U instead. It's much better.

I want a (something)

----------

And so on! In the spirit of thread-starting, I shall want for the first thing- *ahem*

I want to have a car.

Edited January 10, 2015 by Maximus97

Nah, have an ES44AC instead. They're bigger and more fuel efficient.

I want a rocket.

No, no no! Get a plane! They're much cheaper and can (in certain circumstances) take you to space!

I want a Razor Deathadder Chrome!

Nah. I don't know what that is, but you want space tape!

I want a copy of Megaman II.

Oh no, I think you want Kerbal Space Program instead. It's much better, trust me.

I want some chocolate ice cream.

No, no, no. You obviously want frozen yogurt.

I would like the ability to control spacetime.

Nah man! You want to control a kindergarten class!

I want Space Engine to simulate everything.

Wait a minute there, pal- I think you want it to simulate only a couple of things. Like Kindergarten classes.

I would like to see the Kraken up close.

Wait, wait. Why not Reavers? Reavers are a much better alternative.

I'd like to buy that Firefly-class Transport across the used spaceship lot from here.

no" get a used Bengal for 3 pence! its much better!

I would like to get a decent PC

No, see, what you really want is a potato. A computer can't feed you, sonny, but a potato can!

I want to master the piano.

Hold on, are you sure you don't really want to master the oboe?

I want a bar of chocolate.

Oh, come now. Everyone knows carob is way better!

I want a lightsaber.

a class-5 capital ship grade handgun will be much better

how about being a god?

No, being a wizard is much more fun.

I would like ten tons of bacon.

No, what you WANT is 11 tons of bacon. (I legitimately couldn't think of anything better than bacon other than bacon.)

I want 12 tons of bacon.

No man, what you really want is 12 tons of beef!

I want a 20 bucks.

No, 20 dollars is much better than 20 male deer

I want my own Millennium Falcon

Nah. You want Rendar's ship. ( Outrider)

I want a Battlestar.

No you want two, two are better.

I want to have 20/30 vision or better.

No, you want to see in code, like Neo at the end of "The Matrix".

I want a glass of refreshing chocolate milk.

No, have normal milk, it's better for your bones!

I want a supercomputer.

Nah, a Batcomputer is way cooler

I want an LV-N for my model rockets!

No, a mini Vasmir is way better (only if you own a fire proof bunker).

I want to be able to find something that can not be one upped on this.

No, it's much more entertaining to keep the thread going...

I want an 80inch 4k 3D Holographic Dolby 7.2 surround sound TV
